REUNIT.ME - easy-to-use lost and found service

Return Item Activate Tag

Our intelligent tag carries essential information about its owner and anyone it’s attached to, making it simple for anyone who finds a lost item to contact the rightful owner and facilitate its safe return.

Why Reunit.Me ?

  • Security means foresight.

    We cater to situations where your prized possessions are lost.

  • No download or updates required

    Our service crosse browser-based app compatible with any device and all web browsers

  • LifeSaver profile settings

    We can carry crucial information (health and contact details) about a HUMAN, a PET or an ITEM

  • Full control of your data privacy

    We uses industry-best practices to secure your data and puts you in control of what details to share publicly

Designed for lasting performance

Water-resistant
Dirt-resistant
Frost-resistant

What people say about us ?

5/5
Esther Howard
Medical Assistant

I attached a REUNIT.ME sticker to my laptop. One day, I forgot it in a café. Thankfully, someone found it and scanned the QR code. They called me quickly, and I was able to retrieve my laptop the same day! Very grateful for such a convenient service.

5/5
Albert Flores
Dog Trainer

I put REUNIT.ME stickers on my keys and bag. Now, if I happen to lose them, I know that people can quickly and easily contact me through the QR code. Highly recommend this product to anyone who often forgets things.

About

Reunit.Me

is the world's largest lost and found company that helps owners get their lost items back.

Our unique ID tags with QR codes protect all types of portable items: cell phones, laptops, keys, luggage, pets and more. Over 80% of lost items protected by ReturnMe are recovered by their owners within 48 hours thanks to our simple, confidential and secure return system.
